summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West Nickerson Street, from 3rd Avenue West to 15th Avenue West, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7826 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
